QuestData.Title: Go Beyond!
QuestData.Description: Ah, you're just in time. I've made quite the discovery.$b$bI've managed to make a connection even further out than I ever have before.$b$bHow did I do it, you ask? Hard work, that's how! But you knew that. You're almost as hardworking as I am. That's what you're here for!$b$bUp for an even more exciting adventure?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Marasmius in the Ring.
QuestData.RewardText:
Always nice to lend a hand to someone who's just tryin' to do their job. A metaphorical hand, obviously... although in your case, it's literal.
I know what metaphorical means!
Anyway, good work out there.
